mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(asset_seq) AS typeCnt , kubun_code , code_detail_name AS kubunName , (SELECT code_detail_name FROM code_detail WHERE code_master_id = "003" AND code_detail_id = cdl.item1) AS typeName FROM asset JOIN code_detail cdl ON code_master_id = "002" AND kubun_code = code_detail_id WHERE code_master_id = "002" AND status_code != "04" GROUP BY kubun_code ORDER BY typeName, typeCnt DESC
SELECT COUNT(asset_number) AS newItem FROM asset WHERE DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(purchase_date,'%Y%m%d'),'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

SELECT COUNT(asset_seq) AS typeCnt , kubun_code AS kubunCode , code_detail_name kubunName , status_code statusCode , (SELECT code_detail_name FROM code_detail WHERE code_master_id = "001" AND code_detail_id = asset.status_code) statusName FROM asset JOIN code_detail cdl ON code_master_id = "002" AND kubun_code = code_detail_id WHERE kubun_code BETWEEN "02" AND "08" AND status_code BETWEEN "01" AND "02" GROUP BY kubun_code, status_code ORDER BY kubun_code
